text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: Contains the localization(s) and morphology of the primary tumor, which (i.a.) determines the assignment of the TNM classification to the tumor. Please note that the id, url, name and title are shortend because of the 64 char constraint.

purpose.value: This Observation resource represents the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) TNMTumorClassification v4.0 (2024)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/TNMTumorClassification-v4.0(2024EN)).

The implementer alone is responsible for identifying and obtaining any necessary licenses or authorizations to utilize third party IP in connection with the specification or otherwise.

definition.value: Contains the localization(s) of the primary tumor, which (i.a.) determines the assignment of the TNM classification to the tumor.

Behavior of a tumor and cell type expressed in ICD-O-3 morphological or histology code. Describes the cell type (or histology) of the tumor, together with the behavior (malignant or benign). This is determined by a pathologist.
